values: When I Am Raised Up, I Will Go Before You To GalileeWhen I Am Raised Up, I Will Go Before You To Galilee

He is risen! Trust him today. By his mercy he can forgive your sins. And by his sovereignty he can turn all things for your good.He is risen! Trust him today. By his mercy he can forgive your sins. And by his sovereignty he can turn all things for your good.
